games.name: WikiAsteroids
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Space Shooter
games.description: Classic arcade shooter where asteroids spawn from live Wikipedia edits.
games.author: Kevin Payravi

games.name: WikiTrivia
games.subtitle: Timeline Challenge
games.description: Test your knowledge of historical events by placing them in correct order on a timeline.
games.author: Tom Watson

games.name: FactorDay
games.subtitle: Daily Facts & Mini-Games
games.description: Discover fascinating facts and solve challenging puzzles in this collection of educational mini-games.
games.author: Azoodle

games.name: Catfishing
games.subtitle: Category Guessing Game
games.description: Guess Wikipedia articles from their categories alone.
games.author: Matthew

games.name: Redactle
games.subtitle: Daily Wikipedia Puzzle
games.description: Determine the subject of an obfuscated Wikipedia article.
games.author: Ben

games.name: FaceGuesser
games.subtitle: Pixelated Celebrity Quiz
games.description: Identify pixelated celebrity faces in this daily challenge.
games.author: Bored Button

games.name: WikiWho?
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Biography Guesser
games.description: Identify famous people using clues and details from their Wikipedia biographies.
games.author: Rami Kalai

games.name: Wikipedia: The Text Adventure
games.subtitle: Retro Text-Based Adventure
games.description: Explore 1980s-style interactive fiction adventures dynamically generated from Wikipedia articles.
games.author: Kevan Davis

games.name: Wikle
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Navigation Challenge
games.description: Navigate from one Wikipedia article to another in the fewest clicks possible.
games.author: Wikle Team

games.name: Guessr
games.subtitle: Location Guessing Game
games.description: Guess the locations of random Wikidata items.
games.author: blinry

games.name: Everything is Connected
games.subtitle: Connection Puzzle
games.description: Arrange subjects on the board to complete the puzzle.
games.author: Denny Vrandeƒçiƒá

games.name: Wiki Wall Street
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Stock Market
games.description: Trade Wikipedia article 'stocks' based on daily page views.
games.author: Quoc

games.name: FlagQuest
games.subtitle: Flag Guessing Challenge
games.description: Test your geography knowledge with flags from around the world using Wikidata.
games.author: Katie Filbert

games.name: Wikieditbet
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Edit Prediction
games.description: Bet on where edits will happen in Wikipedia article revisions. Win chips by predicting correctly.
games.author: Omar Rizwan

games.name: Gallery Wall
games.subtitle: Art Curation Game
games.description: Drag and drop pictures from a collection of art to decorate a gallery wall.
games.author: Alina Abidi

games.name: Personal Life
games.subtitle: Celebrity Private Life Quiz
games.description: Test your knowledge about the personal lives and intimate details of famous people from Wikipedia.
games.author: Elliott, Sarah, Char

games.name: Days of October
games.subtitle: October-Themed Snake Game
games.description: Play snake while learning about special October celebration days dedicated to animals and foods.
games.author: Lucy Huo, Justin Liang, Amanda Yeh, Melissa Liu

games.name: SIGCOV Hunter
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Citation Improvement
games.description: Help improve Wikipedia by finding reliable sources for under-referenced articles and compete on a leaderboard.
games.author: User:Habst

games.name: Clickipedia
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Clicker Game
games.description: An incremental game where you progressively unlock and explore all of Wikipedia's articles.
games.author: Isabel Lee

games.name: Wiki Mystery
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Detective Game
games.description: A Wikipedia detective game where you figure out interesting causes of death.
games.author: Levi Villarreal, Lucy Huo

games.name: Mind Palace
games.subtitle: Trivia Knowledge Builder
games.description: Build your personal knowledge palace by answering trivia questions, with correct answers unlocking persistent rewards and upgrades.
games.author: Adam Aaronson

games.name: Grokipedia
games.subtitle: AI Hallucination Detection
games.description: Explore a 3D Wikipedia world and hunt for AI-generated fake content hidden among real articles.
games.author: Daniel Erenrich

games.name: Portraits of Thinking
games.subtitle: Posture Imitation Game
games.description: Match and imitate thoughtful poses from portraits of thinkers using your own body movements.
games.author: Yu Lee

games.name: Horses and Divorces
games.subtitle: Celebrity Marriage Trivia
games.description: Compare celebrities and guess which one had more marriages in this quirky trivia game.
games.author: Raquel Fraktas, Derek Miranda, Shristi Singh

games.name: WikiChain
games.subtitle: Wikipedia Path Guesser
games.description: Guess the path between a set of given Wikipedia articles.
games.author: Tom√°s Carlson

games.name: Wikipedia Quiz Bowl Generator
games.subtitle: Quiz Bowl Generator
games.description: Generate competitive quiz bowl packets and trivia questions using Wikipedia's most important articles.
games.author: Art Chaidarun

games.name: WikiRun
games.subtitle: Daily Wikipedia Speed Challenge
games.description: Take on daily challenges to navigate between Wikipedia articles as quickly as possible using only links.
games.author: Wikimedia Foundation

games.name: The Wiki Game
games.subtitle: Multiplayer Wikipedia Racing
games.description: Race against players worldwide to navigate between Wikipedia articles using only internal links.
games.author: Hey Good Game

games.name: WikiCrowd
games.subtitle: Image Labeling Contributions
games.description: Quick and easy contributing by labeling images from Wikimedia Commons.
games.author: Addshore

games.name: Distributed Game
games.subtitle: Wikidata Contributing Platform
games.description: A platform hosting multiple Wikidata games including merge games, mix'n'match, and article matching challenges.
games.author: Magnus Manske
